attributes.action: stop the protection of those damaging OUR education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop protecting people guilty of destroying our education, protect our education rather than those who cause trouble at school, and demand fair treatment. They dont deserve fair treatment.

rejection.details: Please could you make it clearer which group of people you are talking about.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
